channel.title: Yogi-Berra on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in Yogi-Berra on Sermon Archives

item.title: There Will Be an Answer
item.description: This is a typed sermon with some highlighting and underlining in yellow. It is a sermon from 22 Pentecost and was preached in October of 1986. Technically, Luke 18 is now a part of 19 Pent C in the RCL.
